command.name: DiscoverCommandsReceived
command.description: This command may be used to discover all commands processed (received) by this cluster, including optional or manufacturer specific commands.

command.name: DiscoverCommandsReceivedResponse
command.description: The discover commands received response command is sent in response to a discover commands received command, and is used to discover which commands a particular cluster can process.

command.name: DiscoverCommandsGenerated
command.description: This command may be used to discover all commands which may be generated (sent) by the cluster, including optional or manufacturer specific commands.

command.name: DiscoverCommandsGeneratedResponse
command.description: The discover client commands response command is sent in response to a discover client commands command, and is used to discover which commands a particular cluster supports.

command.name: DiscoverAttributesExtended
command.description: This command is similar to the discover attributes command, but also includes a field to indicate whether the attribute is readable, writeable or reportable.

command.name: DiscoverAttributesExtendedResponse
command.description: This command is sent in response to a discover attribute extended command and is used to determine if attributes are readable, writable or reportable.

cluster.name: Basic
cluster.description: Attributes for determining basic information about a device, setting user device information such as location, and enabling a device.

command.name: ResetToFactoryDefaults
command.description: Command that resets all attribute values to factory default.

cluster.name: Power Configuration
cluster.description: Attributes for determining more detailed information about a device's power source(s), and for configuring under/over voltage alarms.

cluster.name: Device Temperature Configuration
cluster.description: Attributes for determining information about a device's internal temperature, and for configuring under/over temperature alarms.

cluster.name: Identify
cluster.description: Attributes and commands for putting a device into Identification mode (e.g. flashing a light).

command.name: EZModeInvoke
command.description: Invoke EZMode on an Identify Server

command.name: UpdateCommissionState
command.description: Update Commission State on the server device.

cluster.name: Groups
cluster.description: Attributes and commands for group configuration and manipulation.

cluster.name: Scenes
cluster.description: Attributes and commands for scene configuration and manipulation.

command.name: AddScene
command.description: Add a scene to the scene table. Extension field sets are supported, and are inputed as arrays of the form [[cluster ID] [length] [value0...n] ...]

cluster.name: On/off
cluster.description: Attributes and commands for switching devices between 'On' and 'Off' states.

cluster.name: On/off Switch Configuration
cluster.description: Attributes and commands for configuring On/Off switching devices.

cluster.name: Level Control
cluster.description: Attributes and commands for controlling devices that can be set to a level between fully 'On' and fully 'Off.'

cluster.name: Alarms
cluster.description: Attributes and commands for sending notifications and configuring alarm functionality.

cluster.name: Time
cluster.description: Attributes and commands that provide a basic interface to a real-time clock.

cluster.name: RSSI Location
cluster.description: Attributes and commands that provide a means for exchanging location information and channel parameters among devices.

cluster.name: Binary Input (Basic)
cluster.description: An interface for reading the value of a binary measurement and accessing various characteristics of that measurement.

cluster.name: Commissioning
cluster.description: Attributes and commands for commissioning and managing a ZigBee device.
